allow: Bash(docker cp tests/unit ml-server:/app/tests && docker exec ml-server python -m pytest /app/tests/unit/ -v --tb=short 2>&1)
Bash(docker cp tests/unit/. ml-server:/app/unit_tests && docker exec ml-server python -m pytest /app/unit_tests/ -v --tb=short 2>&1)

Bash(docker cp tests/unit/test_data_quality.py airflow-webserver:/opt/airflow/test_data_quality.py && \\
docker cp data_quality/validate.py airflow-webserver:/opt/airflow/validate.py && \\
docker exec -w /opt/airflow airflow-webserver python -m pytest /opt/airflow/test_data_quality.py -v --tb=short 2>&1)

Bash(docker cp dbt/packages.yml airflow-webserver:/opt/airflow/dbt/packages.yml && \\
docker exec airflow-webserver dbt deps --project-dir /opt/airflow/dbt --profiles-dir /opt/airflow/dbt --no-version-check 2>&1)

Bash(docker cp dbt/packages.yml airflow-webserver:/opt/airflow/dbt/packages.yml && \\
docker exec airflow-webserver dbt deps --project-dir /opt/airflow/dbt --profiles-dir /opt/airflow/dbt --no-version-check 2>&1 && \\
docker exec airflow-webserver dbt run --project-dir /opt/airflow/dbt --profiles-dir /opt/airflow/dbt --no-version-check --select dim_dates 2>&1)
